item.description: As the summer winds down we are looking forward to spending cool crisp afternoons with our dogs! Best Friends Pet Care is hosting a meet up group for social dogs and their friends. We have a indoor/outdoor play area specially designed for doggie play dates. We provide toys, plentiful water, and clean up. THIS MEET UP IS FREE. All breeds are welcome so long as your dog gets along with other dogs in a playgroup environment. Please be sure your dog is up to date on all vaccines including: Rabies, Distemper, and Bordetella. We can't wait to meet you and your pals....we will also have a special treat of goodie bags for the dogs and cider/doughnuts for their human companions!
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Fallin' for a Fun time!
